entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #191: Allow Voting For Features
entry.content:
+1 - err, I mean this is a good idea. And apparently the Redmine user community agrees, though it appears development support has been spotty. Check out these links.

    • http://www.redmine.org/plugins/redmine_vote
    • http://www.redmine.org/issues/1011
    • https://github.com/dextra/redmine_issues_poll - looks like this is the plugin which is still under active support/development
